about_the_game:
Get ready to NOK it out of the park with this immersive physics-based sandbox hidden object game! Step into a virtual world where you'll toss your worries aside and dive headfirst into the wild art of furniture flinging. It's like a treasure hunt, but with a twist! Explore meticulously designed environments that will leave you chair-ished and table-lled with excitement. Sharpen those observation skills, because in NOK, you'll need to think outside the sandbox to uncover hidden treasures and unravel pun-tastic secrets. This captivating game merges the joy of exploration with mind-bending puzzle-solving, offering hours of relaxing gameplay. Get ready to NOK 'n' roll!


Features
  • Fun Physics
    Everyone feels the frustration of not finding what they're looking for. Mess everything up until you find it! The vast majority of items can be grabbed and thrown. Let your inner messiness come to the surface.
  • Collect Items
    Find all possible items and store them in a precious personal gallery. All the items you find are kept in a collection that you can later inspect and share with your friends.
  • Hidden Secrets
    The more you explore, the more you find! Unknown interactions and secret items are waiting to be revealed... Cook the perfect steak or build the biggest sandcastle, maybe there's even a friendly snail lurking around. Everything is just a click away.
  • Relaxation
    There's no rush. You have all the time in the world to explore your favorite scenarios and discover their secrets. So, just sit back, relax, and listen to the ambiance. Everything in due time.

Sometimes all we want is to unleash chaos and disorder (you can do that here).



Developer note
We are a small team with big ideas. NOK is still in development and everything you see is subject to change!
